website_summaries.verdict: Fast, sturdy, well-designed and with excellent photo quality, the Samsung NX1 hits all the bases for action-shooting enthusiasts.
pros: The Samsung NX1 is fast, well-designed, weather resistant and feature-packed, and it produces great photos and videos
cons: There's no charger included, and USB charging takes longer than we'd like
Plus, it could use tracking autofocus when you're shooting via the viewfinder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing. I use it primarily for video but it can shoot photos as well. After a few weeks of use I must say that these nothing out there like this. I even customized what the buttons do. I switched the position of some buttons so that record and exposure lock are the same place as a 5dmk3. I also customized the back wheel so I can get quick access to video preview and iso. I also setup nfc to an old nexus tablet I have and when I take photos they automatically get stored in the nexus as a sort of backup HDD. You definitely get more than your money's worth with this.
customer_reviews.author: Don Seoul Oh

customer_reviews.title: Samsung has a winner.
customer_reviews.text: Samsung really hit it out of the park with this camera. Even though video recording is h.265 instead of h.264, there are now several conversion programs that work great. Beware though, when you convert the compact h.265 files to, say Pro Res LT, the file sizes will increase considerably. But in almost every way, this is an awesome camera And Samsung seems to be responsive to users and supplying firmware upgrades (rather than making us wait for the NX2!) to improve performance. Limited by lens selection, but there are lots of adapters out there and the lenses that are available -- even the 16-50 kit lens -- perform admirably. Very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Millard

product_meta.title: Samsung EV-NX1ZZZBZBUS 28 MP Wireless Smart Compact System with 3-Inch AMOLED (Black)
product_meta.description:
The NX1 is defined by its advanced 28.2MP APS-C, BSI CMOS Sensor. Delivering up to 15 frames per second bursting with sharp detail and intense colors. The large sensor is ideal for creating detailed images and stunning 4k/UHD video.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Take exceptionally detailed photos and videos--and share them easily with friends--using the Samsung NX1 28.2 MP Smart 4K Camera. This digital camera contains a 28.2-megapixel CMOS sensor and lets you record videos in 4K resolution, which is four times as detailed as Full HD. Fast auto-focus allows you to shoot continuously, while Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and NFC capabilities let you connect to other devices. The bundle includes a 16-50mm lens, a grip, an extra battery, and an external charger.

The NX1 packs 4K video recording ability and a large 28.2-megapixel CMOS sensor into a compact body.
View larger.

Record more detail with less noise, thanks to the 28.2-megapixel CMOS sensor.
View larger.

Fast auto-focus lets you shoot up to 70 images at one time.
View larger.

4K video offers four times the resolution and detail of Full HD.

28.2-MEGAPIXEL CMOS SENSOR FOR GREATER DETAIL
For optimal results, the NX1 contains a 28.2-megapixel APS-C sensor with a backside illumination (BSI) structure that enables it to gather more light than conventional CMOS sensors and with more pixels. This sensor helps you capture those special moments with exceptionally detailed photos.

NX AF SYSTEM III FOR ACCURATE HIGH-SPEED PHOTOS
This camera contains Samsung's NX AF System III technology for fast auto-focus, along with a Hybrid Auto-Focus system featuring 205 phase detection points with 153 cross-type sensor points and a shutter speed of up to 1/8,000 seconds. The result is clear, accurate pictures, even of fast-moving subjects.

POWERFUL IMAGE PROCESSING WITH DRIME V
Featuring a high-speed DRIMe V image processor, the NX1 can shoot 15 photos a second at 28 megapixels and record 4K UHD video at 30 frames per second. Capture amazing photo sequences or get just the right picture.

FAST AUTO-FOCUS FOR CONTINUOUS SHOOTING
The NX1 also allows you to shoot up to 70 images at one time. The camera's continuously tracking auto-focus is fast and precise, so you can simply keep your finger on the shutter and take photos. Note that the shooting performance may vary depending on the particular SD card used.

ELECTRONIC VIEW FINDER TO COMPOSE YOUR SHOTS
The NX1 comes equipped with an AMOLED electronic view finder that provides a clean, wide view and comes on in only 0.005 seconds, so you can quickly see and compose your shots.

NOISE REDUCTION FOR CLEAR IMAGES
Shooting in low light, even at a high ISO of 25,600, is simple with the NX1 thanks to Adaptive Noise Reduction technology. As a result, you can produce clear images that are virtually free of noise.

4K UHD VIDEO RECORDING FOR SHARP DETAILS
The NX1 allows you to record 4K video, which offers four times the resolution and details of Full HD--optimal whether you're capturing a family event or a breathtaking outdoor scene. High Efficiency Video Coding (HEVC/H.265) capability lets you use just half the memory typically required for HD, while Samsung Multimedia Converter PC software, which is available as a free download, converts HEVC files to ProRes 422 for editing.

MAGNESIUM ALLOY BODY FOR DURABILITY
Lightweight yet sturdy, the NX1 is fully crafted from a durable magnesium alloy and is built to resist dust and minor water splashes, so you can use it even in dusty or damp conditions. (Exposure to severe conditions is not recommended.) The camera also has a rubber-like exterior and ergonomic grip that make it comfortable and secure to hold, allowing you to focus on getting just the right shot.

LCD TO VIEW CAMERA SETTINGS
A small status LCD screen on the top of the camera allows you to conveniently see all your current camera settings at a glance, so that you can get your shot just the way you want it.

WI-FI, BLUETOOTH, AND NFC CONNECTIVITY FOR SHARING
With the NX1, it's simple to connect and share photos with other devices thanks to integrated Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and NFC capabilities. Wireless AC technology allows you to quickly share high-resolution photos and videos.

BUILT-IN AUTO-FOCUS FEATURES FOR CONVENIENCE
The NX1 provides some handy auto-focus features such as Active Auto-Focus, which can detect when your subject starts moving and automatically switch the camera to a continuous mode, and Movie Auto-Focus, which uses a quick-phase auto-focus for faster response and less wobbling.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung NX1 28.2 MP Smart 4K Camera, BP1900 battery, micro-USB cable, adapter, hand strap, Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 5, Samsung software CD, quick start guide, and warranty card.
